statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{2 \, x^{3} + 9 \, x^{2} + 9 \, x - 3 , -x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - x , -x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 8 \, x + 3 , 3 \, x^{3} + 18 \, x^{2} + 24 \, x - 9 , x^{3} - 6 \, x + 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
